definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The report cited data from the State Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 报道来援引了国家防汛抗旱总指挥部的数据加以说明。

sentences.english: While paying due attention to preventing floods, the country should prevent and fight drought as well.
sentences.chinese: 在注意防汛的同时，做好防旱抗旱工作。

sentences.english: While paying due attention to preventing floods, we should prevent and fight drought as well.
sentences.chinese: 在注意防汛的同时，做好防旱抗旱工作。

sentences.english: Therefore, flood and drought control has been consistently the seasonal priority of the project area.
sentences.chinese: 因此，防汛防旱历来是示范县季节性的重点工作。

sentences.english: In the course of storm-surge, the safety of seadike is an important issue of flood defense.
sentences.chinese: 风暴潮期间海塘工程的安全是防汛工作的重要问题。

sentences.english: The dam builders state that there is no practical flood protection alternative in the middle reach of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 水坝工程师指出，在长江中游没有实用的防汛办法。

sentences.english: Non-engineering measures for flood control are inadaptable to emergency requirements against flooding.
sentences.chinese: 防洪非工程措施不适应防汛抢险要求。

definition: water levels during the flood season
to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
